name: Abica Luna
description:
Abica Luna is an online, multiplayer, scifi strategy game.

  • Mine asteroids and hunt NPC pirates for bounty prizes.
  •  Use your rewards to customize your own spacecraft, carefully choosing the right balance of power systems, shields, mining equipment and weapons.
  •  Explore space and search for wormholes to discover advanced technology.
  •  Seek out the most profitable areas of space and fight other players over those territories in PVP combat.

Java is required to play Abica Luna. If you don't have Java installed on your computer, you can get it here: https://www.java.com/en/

Debian users: There is an issue with Java and Pulse Audio in Debian 9. If you notice some sound effects are not working in Abica Luna or other Java programs, edit your Java sound properties file as is described in this forum thread: https://itch.io/t/235944/java-and-pulse-audio-in-debian-9
